original_title: Strawberry Shortcake: Bright Lights, Big Dreams
overview: It's time to dazzle and dream with Strawberry and her friends as they compete for some berry special prizes. Whether it's spinning in the annual dance-off or beating a world record, there is nothing these girls can't try. But when the road to success seems overwhelming, they'd soon discover that the real key to being a winner is just having fun with your friends.
title: Strawberry Shortcake: Bright Lights, Big Dreams
